name: SHIFT-CTRL
description:
Full screen recommended when using middle mouse click. Due to problems with transparent images in Unity WebGL, some graphical fidelity might have been lost in the web build. Try the downloadable windows build for the best experience!

A game about mapping and remapping keys. Ship packages, defuse bombs and fight off rogue bots while managing your bot's controls. Try not to run out of control, literally!

CONTROLS: All up to you ;)

Left Mouse Button: connect nodes, redraw over an existing line to remove the connection.
Right Mouse Button: move nodes around.
Middle mouse button: remove all connections on a specific node.
